Jesse looked out the window at the rolling scenery passing by, deep in thought about everything that had happened and that was going to happen. He was on an Mega Bus heading for a new state to go live with his Aunt, whom he had never seen before. He had only ever heard of her through stories of his parents and the occasional phone call on his Birthday.

The thought of his parents brought some gloom to Jesse. Not lest than 2 months ago his parents had died in a plane crash while taking a trip to the Bahamas. A hurricane had come out of nowhere and swept the plane into the sea, no survivors. Jessie of course had really taken a punch to the heart on that one. He had loved his parents, and they loved him. So much so that since not soon after he graduated from College 5 months prior, his parents had offered to let him move back in while he tried to figure out what direction to take his life in. But then the plane crashed happened.

After the funeral, Jesse out of nowhere had been getting numerous text messages, phone calls and emails from his Aunt that he hardly knew. She had been the sister of his mother, but for some reason Jessie had never met her before. In the numerous messages, his Aunt had been pouring her heart out comforting him and sharing her grief in the loss of her sister. In her last few messages, she had insisted that Jessie come live with her, both to comfort each other and also to grant the same offer his parents had when he had graduated: a home to figure things out in. He was too sure, but he really didn't have much family left and was feeling lost, and he didn't want to hurt his Aunt's feelings.

So that was the reason he was on a luxury bus heading towards a new life in a new state. He was gracious for her hospitality, but still nervous because he hardly new anything about his Aunt. His mother said that she had always preferred to live out the life she wanted to live, but she always said it with a chuckle for some reason, showing that she knew something he wasn't telling him. Jesse had heard a few stories about her, and seen a photo of her through her messages. From what he could gather she was a 40-something BBW with a bit of a flatulent problem, but his mother said his Aunt was always proud of who she was and enjoyed being herself. So that was plausible evidence enough to give her a chance, right?

Jesse heard the bus driver announce their upcoming arrival, so Jessie began to gather his things. When the bus pulled into the station, he went inside and sat quietly, messaging his aunt that he arrived via his phone. She responded enthusiastically say "I'll be right there! Hope your as excited as I am!".

For a good 20 minutes he waited and just messaged on your phone. That's when he heard a femininely voice calling your name.

"YOO-HOO! JESSE!!

You turned around and was shocked by the appearance of your Aunt...

Jesse stared at this High Society-like Lady that was his Aunt Margaret.

Her weight wasn't even like his parents had described to him in their stories. She was Huge! She was only 5 inches taller than you, but she had to be at least 400 pounds! But it was her outfit that really stood out. Her neck and face were adorn with stylish makeup of high class and a very large pearl necklace resting between her neck and cleavage. Her hair was something too, as it was very large, sandy brown, and done in a large updo.

Overall, his Aunt Margaret looks like a lady of High Society from the 1950s and 60s.

"Why hello, Jessie", she said approaching Jesse, her voice feminine and polite. "Its so wonderful to finally meet you!"

"Um, Yeah, you too- ACK!!" was all Jesse got out before she brought Jesse in for a smothering hug.

"I'm so delighted to have you staying with me" she said letting go, unaware of the embarrassment Jesse just suffered. "Well, let's be off then. It's getting late." She turned around and started walking, and then suddenly her large hip bumped against a support beam, and she let out a loud FRRRRRRT!!

"Whoopsie" She squeaked, blushing a bit. "I'm sorry about that Jessie."

"Oh it's alright, uh Aunt Margaret". Jesse says uncomfortably. "Nothing to be embarrassed about.

"But I am embarrassed" she said. "Usually my gas is much louder than that. Darn Shame."

"Louder? Darn Shame?" Jesse said, flabbergasted that his Aunt was not ashamed by her fart, but instead by how soft - to her at least - it sounded.

"Yes, they are." Aunt Margaret said. She saw the look of confusion on her nephew's face, and just smiled warmly. She place a gloved hand on his soldier and began to explain.

I consider my self a woman of high class despite my problem, but I don't let it, nor my weight, change how I feel about myself." She struck a femininely pose. "I am proud of who I am, and I love being me!" Then she bent over to the side and let out a loud FRRRRRRRT!

They both started heading towards her car, a classy sports vehicle, when she turns to Jesse and gives you a wink.

"Give it time, my dear nephew, and you'll get use to it" She smiled. "Who knows? Maybe you'll even embrace my life-changing views?"

Yeah, Like THAT is going to happen. Jesse laughed in his head.

And so Jesse and his Aunt Margaret went off to her home, which was large house, almost like a small mansion, in the suburbs of the city. She had farted all the way there and into the house, completely ignoring Jesse's discomfort by it and prattling on about life in the suburbs. He didn't see the harm and thought some of them were cute, but unfortunately some had a flatulent problem like Aunt Margaret. Also, there was something a bit off about them that Jesse couldn't quite put his finger on.

Overall though, Jesse was amused and annoyed by his Aunt Margret's Matriarchy, High Class caricature-ness and flatulence. He could help but wonder sometimes what it would be like to be in his Aunt's shoes.

One day, however, he had gotten the answer. Jesse was home alone during the middle of the day while his Aunt was out grocery shopping for a party. He was bored and decided to explore the house to find something to do. His snooping eventually brought him to Aunt Margaret's room, where he found a elegant room with lots feminine accessories, a large plush bed with dozens of large pillows, and curiously one of her full wadrope outfits sprawled out on the bed. He reckoned they were out to be cleaned later.

That's when he got an idea out of nowhere. He immediately stripped of his clothes and proceed to put on his Aunt's. He slipped on a pair of his Aunts Mary Janes, then went to his Makeup Table to apply some of her lipstick and eye liner. He found a matching hat in her closet and placed it on his head.

Jesse was now looking himself over in the mirror. He looked even more of a caricature than his Aunt, and he could not help but laugh at his reflection. He then decided to go even further into character and starting copying the mannerism he saw his Aunt use: her walk, her talk, etc. Then he felt something in his stomach. A built up of gas from the burrito he had for launch. Smirking, he bent forward and unleash a massive fart of his own. FRRRRRRT!

"Oh my Lord!" He shouted in a fake, high feminine voice to imitate his Aunt (And surprisingly, he sounded a bit just like her). Who couldn't help but roll his head back in laugher.

Jesse stared at this Southern Lady that was his Aunt Anna Belle.

Her weight wasn't even like his parents had described to him in their stories. She was Huge! She was only 5 inches taller than you, but she had to be at least 400 pounds! Her belly was perfectly round and had two watermelon-sized breast resting comfortable on top of it. Her are were like bags or pudding and her thighs like tree trunk. Her but stood out behind her and had a tremendous shelf with it. Her face was plumped with dimpled cheeks and a second chin going-on third.

But it was her outfit that really stood out. It was a peach sundress that clung to her very round body. It had ruffles at the bottom of it and on the shoulder straps. Jesse reckoned if his Aunt wasn't so huge, the dress might fit a normal girl, but on her is was tight and form fitting. She also had a sunhat, and was holding both a ruffle-decorated parasol and fanning herself with a large, floral-patterned, folding fan. Her blonde hair was done curls. Also, her hat had a large bow and feather in it.

Overall, his Aunt Anna Belle looked like a large caricature of a modern Southern Belle.]

"Well, Howdy-Doo there,, Jesse", she said with thick southern accent. She placed her fan in her pocket and held out her hand for Jesse to shake. "It is truly a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance."

"Um" Jesse stammered, shaking her hand. "Its nice to finally meet you too, Aunt Anna Belle."

"Please, call just call me Auntie or Anna Belle, sugar," she smiled. "I may be a woman of manners, but I want things between you and me to be open like a Sweet Tea pitcher".

"Well, ok Sure. Auntie is is" You smiled back. Maybe she's not so strange after all Jesse thought to himself. Then suddenly his thought were interrupted by very loud "PHHHHHHHRRRRRRAAAAAAP!!"

"What the hell was that" Jesse ask, rather taken back.

"OH MY OH MY!" Auntie blushed, taking out her fan and fanning her backside, reveal that than noise was a large fart coming from her. "I'm so sorry, Jesse. I do apologize for my "Dairy-Aire". I'm afraid I pass wind like a dustbowl during tornado season, and louder than a rooster cocka-doodling in the morning I might add"

Jesse was taken back by this. Its was obvious his Aunt was a real southern belle, but from his understand in a history class in college, southern belles weren't suppose to acknowledge bodily functions. He must have had an obvious thinking face, because his Aunt Anna Belle spotted his confusion and proceeded to answer for him.

"I do declare by the look on your face you are taken back by my flatulence." She said, and Jesse bashfully nodded uncertainly, trying not to offend her. "Yes, Jesse. I am very much a Southern Belle, born and raised in the good ol' South. I am woman of manners, old-fashioned values, and I enjoy my cooking a little too much." She smiled at the last part and patted her belly with her fan. "However, I was born with a chronic flatulence problem, and I am constantly tooting the brown whistle. But I always apologize for my gas, and all my friends and neighbors understand my constant need to address and apologize for my farts."

"Your friends and neighbors are ok with this?" Jesse asked curiously?

"Yes, they are:" she smiled and began to lead Jesse to her large truck. Her walking was more of a waddle, but she did it all with her back straight and head held high, all the while twirling her parasol and fanning her glistening face. "You'll meet them all at party tonight."

"Party?" Jesse asked surprised.

"Yes. I wanted to welcome my nephew into the South with Love and Style. Oh you'll Just, I say you'll just have a wonderful time" She then let out a large FRRRT! as she climbed into her truck and drove both of them to her home.

Her home was a large Manor stereotypically found in the higher class of the south. She showed Jesse to his rooms and left to prepare for the party. Jesse found that she had laid out some slightly dressier clothes for the party.

The Party was fun by Jesse's standards. Most of the guests were females either Anna Belle's or Jesse's age, or somewhere in between. Jesse was a little disappointed that there weren't many guys to talk to, but all the girls took a liking to him and proceeded to flirt with him. The Food was excellent too, Lots of Fried Chicken, Baked Beans, Collared Greens, and plenty of Sweet Tea and Lemonade. Aunt Anna Belle made sure that Jesse was kept fed throughout the whole party.

A week into life with his new Auntie Jesse had to admit it had its ups and downs. The ups were his Aunt's lovely cooking and the little garden parties where she would invite her friends and their daughters and nieces, who in turned wanted Jesse to join them in the party. The older woman were plump like Auntie, their daughters were like smaller, younger versions of her without the farting. Jesse didn't mind though, he like bigger girls (although, there was something off about a few of them that he couldn't quite put his finger on. Like the fact a few daughters and nieces had lower active of voices despite being feminine).

The Downs, whoever, were that fact that Jesse's Aunt was trying so hard to force her Southern mannerism and lifestyle on him. Anna Belle's response was that "Southern Belles break rules in good humor, but please do as I say and not as I do." Also their was her constant farting that both stunk and sounded like a constant foghorn.

One day, Jesse had been left alone by Aunt Anna Belle as she had been invited to one of her friend's garden parties instead. She offered Jesse an invitation to join, but her were getting a little tired of her company (despite the fact that he knew she meant well and had taken him into her home). Jesse explored many dens and rooms before coming to his Auntie's room. Curiosity got the better of him and he peaked inside. It was very feminine and girly for a Southern Belle like his aunt. Jesse spotted a close on the side of the room and looked in, and was taken back by how much clothes his aunt had. On closer inspection he saw that the ones in the back were much smaller in size, and concluded these must have been clothes from when she was younger. He then beamed as he got an idea.

He found a classic, pink Southern Belle dress with many frills and ruffles. Pulling out his phone, he looked up "How to dress like a stereotypical Southern Belle", and proceeded to put the outfit on. He wore it all: the panties, the corset, the pantaloons, the poofy dress and ruffles, the shoes. He even found a matching hat and parasol. The clothes were still big for him (his aunt must have been a big girl even when she was young), so he took some pillows and stuffed them in the clothes to give himself a large belly, ass and breasts.

After the outfit was put on, he stepped out of the closet and began to parade around the room, pretending to be - and horribly I might add - his Auntie Anna Belle. He was trotting about, shouting in a high feminine voice southern phrases like "I do declare" or "I say I say". Jesse then spotted a spare folding fan on his aunts' makeup table. He grabbed it and started fanning his ass, making raspberry noise to immitate his Aunt's farting.

He rolled his head back in laughter, but jumped when he heard a female voice shout "JESSSE!!"

Jesse stared at himself in the mirror, dressed in the custom made fat suit his Aunt had bought him to approximate her huge dimensions. It was a chore to put on each morning and the facial prosthetics itched on occasion, but Anna Belle insisted if he wanted to be a real southern lady.

And he did not.

But it was easier than telling her the truth, that he had been making fun of her. And because he was a coward, Jesse was forced to dress as an overweight woman until he could put on enough weight to really look like a fat woman. “What have I gotten myself into?” Jesse sighed to the mirror.

“Jesse, honey-belle! It’s time for y’all to get intah your dress for the day!” auntie Anna Belle yelled to him.

Trudging down the hall Jesse made his way to her room, where she beamed in her dress and sun hat, holding out in front of her what at first could be mistaken for a tent but was actually the dress she had picked out for Jesse to wear that day. Her smile and bright eyes hoped that he liked it and she giggled like a schoolgirl when his slightest of head nods confirmed it for her. She couldn’t help herself and Auntie Anna Belle cut some fine cheese in excitement. “Why, pahdon me,” she apologized, “I just couldn’t help but let out a little of my…!”

“Dairy-Aire. No problem Auntie, no problem,” Jesse assured her with feigned interest.

“Why aren’t you the gentleman,” she snickered as she put the dress down and grabbed the panties they would need to start. It wasn’t long until Jesse had his panties, pantaloons, corset, and shoes on. Heels hurt his ankles, but he was slowly getting used to them.

The burgundy red, poofy dress with ruffles and matching parasol and sunhat were waiting to finish up Jesse’s dressing session. He struggled with the high-heeled booties but once he had them on he was the spitting image of Anna Belle. “My, oh my but aren’t you the cock of the walk. I do declare that when I see you all dolled up like this, well, you know what they say about sincerest form of flattery!” Anna Belle’s chronic flatulence contributed its thoughts to her sentiment in a loud manner all its own. “Well, I have to declare my apologies for my derriere’s Dairy-Aire!” she frowned a bit, a far away look in her eyes, “Hopefully you too will join me in my apologies.”

“Because I’ll fart a lot?” Jesse inquired flatly as he adjusted the large bust hanging off his chest.

“Well to put it crudely, yes. But more because it will mean we’re really twins! That you’ve gotten your wish, to be just like your Auntie Anna Belle!” She grabbed him by the shoulders and looked him in the eyes, barely holding back tears of joy, “And you will nevah, my dear nephew, know how much that will mean to me!”

It was that sweet southern guilt that kept Jesse dressed as his Auntie’s twin. Not being the most assertive of people to begin with, Jesse had decided to just live with the consequences of his single greatest mistake. Jesse just sighed again and smiled weakly at his Auntie, “Let’s go get breakfast. You can tech me how to hold my pinkie out.”

Anna Belle smiled and farted, “Just follow me and my lady musk, my dear nephew and soon enough you’ll be breaking awkward silences with your gas just like me!”

"Jesse Belle!" She joyfully hailed, sticking her head into the parlor room. "That's enough I say that's enough strutting your stuff, sugar. Our guest will be here soon for our garden party." She then tooted a happy fart.

"G-Guests?!" Jesse recoiled back in fear, his face white as a pair of before-Labor Day shoes.

"Why, but of course, darling." Anna Belle beamed. "I've invited some of my closest friends over to formally introduce and celebrate your transition into my southern niece and twin!" His aunt saw the worried look on his face, and gave him a reassuring smile as she wrapped an arm around his shoulders (with difficulty as he was in the fat suit).

"Oh don't worry your sweet tea self, Jesse. I haven't invited complete strangers, just my closest friends from my sorority sister days. You remember Alice, Jennifer and Laurie, don't you sug."

Jesse did remember them. He had met them when his aunt had thrown that first welcome part for him upon his arrival. And in his short time here they had visited regularly. But just because they weren't strangers doesn't mean he was happy they were coming. Not just cause of Jesse's predicament now, but because they always rubbed him the wrong way for different reasons.

"Uh, I'm not sure I'm ready to be seen like this, Aunty," Jesse struggled to put it delicately. "I mean, don't you think I have a lot to learn before I can be properly reintroduced to your friends?"

Jesse smiled awkwardly in defeat, swearing on the inside at the grave he was continuously digging for himself.

"Now c'mon, sweet twin of mine! We must'n keep the girls waiting. A proper belle never makes their friends wait for even a second!" With that she lead her way out of the parlor, blowing a loud FRUUMPP of a fart and then fanning her backside with her foldable fan. "Do pardon me." Jesse sighed and followed.

Jennifer had brown hair in a ponytail and her sundress was light yellow. Most of her weight was in her gigantic ass, and it took up most of the sofa she was sitting on. Like Alice, she took great pride in her girth, but a little too much for Jesse's taste. Her ass was always so sensitive, and whenever it brushed against something Jennifer would shudder and wheeze out sexually moans of pleasure. She was also, quite frankly, a total airhead.

Laurie had straight, jet black hair, and her sundress was a deep purple. Her claim to BBW fame was her massive breast, which looked like beachballs slowly making their way to exercise balls. She rubbed Jesse the wrong way the most, as when he first met her it was clear she didn't like him. She held herself in proper southern belle manners, but took great pride in making sure Jesse knew she was better than him. Jesse thought she knew his Aunt's quirks made him uncomfortable, and being her friend Jesse figured she didn't like that Jesse was ungrateful for his Aunt's hospitality.

"Warm Welcomes, everyone," Anna Belle greeted her friends, motioning to Jesse. "I do believe you have met my my dear nephew Jesse. But now it gives me such great pleasure to reintroduce him as my niece, Jesse Belle".

"Salutations, Jesse Belle," Alice greeted. "We Are so excited to have you as part of our sisterhood!" Jennifer squealed. "Yeah, welcome aboard, kid," Laurie said, though Jesse was certain there was some venom and suspicion in her greeting.

"Um, a pleasure to re-make your acquaintance," Jesse stammered. He then remembered southern rules of etiquette and gave a little curtsy, much to his embarrassment. He and his aunt then took their seats amongst the group.

"I gotta go!" Jesse suddenly cried in shame. He ran into the kitchen and cried out in fury. How am I going to get out of this? He thought.

But doesn't matter. Point is you're finally startin to pork up pretty good. Not like it makes a difference to the kinda guys you see around here if you might look knocked up." 14.content:
Jesse stared at this Matronly, Girly-Girl Lady that was his Aunt Fanny.

Her weight wasn't even like his parents had described to him in their stories. She was Huge! She was only 5 inches taller than you, but she had to be at least 400 pounds! Her belly was perfectly round and had two watermelon-sized breast resting comfortable on top of it. Her are were like bags or pudding and her thighs like tree trunk. Her but stood out behind her and had a tremendous shelf with it. Her face was plumped with dimpled cheeks and a second chin going-on third.

But it was her appearance aside from her weight that really stood out. She wore a tight, yellow housedress with frills on the sleeves that hung over her round body like a paint job, and exposed a large bit of cleavage. She had very feminine jewelry and nails on her fingers and toes. She wore sandal-like heels. Her hair was the most remarkable thing. It was big and curly and strawberry blonde, and styled into a large Bouffant. And even though she was forty, her fat hid her age well and she looked a bit younger than 40 years old.

Overall, this woman looked like a cross between a plus-sized cougar and very large (but slightly more beautiful) Edna Turnbald.

"Aunt Fanny?" Jesse asked, still not sure if this woman was his aunt.

"Yes, sweetie." She said in a very feminine voice. She smiled warmly and showed off large dimples. She pattered towards Jesse and wrapped him an loving embrace.

"It so wonderful to finally meet you dear. You're mother told me so much about you in our conversations on the phone." She looked down sadly at the thought of her sister. "It is a poor shame what happened to her."

"Yeah, it is" Jesse said, sadden too." But then when his aunt saw him sad, she immediately perked up.

"Fiddlesitcks! What am I being a no good, Gloomy Gus for? I should be making you feel welcome." She suddenly dug into her large purse and pulled out a large tubaware of homemade chocolate brownies.

"I bet you're starving from your trip." She said, holding up a brownie to your face. "Here, eat something."

"Oh, no thank you, Aunt Fan-" but Jesse was immediately cut off by her shoving a brownie into his maw. She then cupped his chin and started making chewing motions with his face, prompting Jesse to chew like she wants. The brownie was good even if it was a surprise, so rich, moist and packed with fudge. Jesse swallowed and started to speak to thank her, but instantly another brownie was shoved into his mouth. This Pattern went on for 10 minutes, and Aunt Fanny herself was also eating some brownies, enjoying the fact you were bonding over her baking. By the time the tubaware was empty, you both had chocolate smear on your cheeks.

"Oh, poop-knuckles" She said, suddenly realizing what she had done. "I'm so sorry, Jesse. I should have warned you that I'm a stay-at-home chef, and I love cooking and feeding other people as much as I do for myself." She pulls out a wetnap and begins to wipe both hers and Jesse's face clean.

"Oh, its ok, Aunt Fanny." Jesse said, trying not to make the situation more uncomfortable than it was. "My best friend in college had a Great-Grandmother who was a feeder. Everytime she'd visit, wed be stuffed to the gills with-" THHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTHHHHHH

Jesse stood shock at what had just cut him off. It was a loud, think fart. And it came from Aunt Fanny.

"Oh dear. I do apologize, Jesse:, Aunt Fanny said, rubbing the back of her head and looking sheepish. "But I guess now you know why they call me Aunt Fanny".

"Does..." Jesse spoke, trying wrap his head around this. "Does that happen a lot?"

"All the time, I afraid, dearie," She said. "Its a condition I've have since I was a little girl. Its kinda why your mother didn't let me visit her the the rest of you."

"That bad, huh?" Jesse chuckled nervously.

":But don't worry, sugar." She Beamed. "I promise you will get use to it. All of my BFFS and their little girls don't mind. And it actually has helped me a lot with my gentlemen guests" She winked at that last sentence.

"Gentlemen guest?" Jesse question, still not grasping what she meant.

"Yes, I actually have a very active love life when I'm not being the lovely and large woman you see me as. But I'm sure a college graduate yourself knows something about that."

Jesse was a bit taken back by this. As girly and matronly as she is, Jesse thought, she's very open about sex life? I don't know what to make of this.

"Well, come on, sweetie," Aunt Fanny grasped Jesse's hand and began to lead him to her minivan. "Lets go home and start you new life with me. I'll cook you a wonderful first meal to welcome you!"

Upon arriving at Aunt Fanny's two-story homes, Jesse wasn't that surprise to find it was decorated with very girly and feminine colors and decore. Walls were pink, magenta and purple, couches and chairs were decorated with a floral pattern, and their were many nicknacks about the women and girls loves, such as mermaids, unicorns and ponies, and many pictures of cute, baby animals. Most books Jesse found were cook books or romance novels, same went for the shelf of romcoms and classic Cooking Channel DVDS. And it was no surprise that Jesse's room was just as feminine, but Aunt Fanny promised she could help him redecorate if he wanted.

Dinner rolled around, and Aunt Fanny made true of her word. There was all sorts of fattening foods and treats to eat, enough to feed an entire army. They might as well have been, because Fanny was constantly urging Jesse to eat more. He almost went into a coma.

Jesse learned more about his Aunt Fanny in his time there. She was always cooking and eating, trying out new recipes that were as fattening as the last, but they did suppress the smells made by Fanny's gas. She would often invite over her fellow Matronly, girly-girl friends who were just as big as her and have cooking sessions with them. Sometimes that would bring their nieces and daughters too, who took a liking to Jesse. He didn't mind, despite the fact that these girls were slowly on their way to being the size of the older woman. Something was also unique about them, but he couldn't tell what.

When she didn't have friends over, Aunt Fanny was always doing something girly, such as arts and crafts, reading or watching romance novels and sitcoms, she even Fawned over Oprah Winfrey. What little exercise she did was was with her friends, and often it was yoga, step-arobics or pilates. She also loved shopping and going to salons almost every day.

Jesse also learned that his Aunt had different styles of fashion. She had a lot of sundresses and house dresses, but she also had cackies and tops that showed off her round and curvy body that she was proud of. She also had some more "aggressive: wardrobe choices, such as her animal print dresses, unitards/catsuits and leggings.

Overall, Life with Aunt Fanny wasn't too bad, but their were downs for every up.

A week into living with his Aunt, Jesse had learned just how active her love life was. Almost every night, Aunt Fanny had brought some much younger gentleman him for a roll in the hay. She did quite well for herself, Jesse had to admit, but unfortunately he could not drown out the noise she and her lovers would make during sex, much often of which involved Fanny's constant gas.

When she wasn't having sex, Aunt Fanny was constantly trying to get Jesse to partake in her activities, whether it it was watching Oprah or a soap opera, doing polates with her and her friend, or stuffing him to the gills with food. Said she wanted to help him further develop his feminine side.

One day, Aunt Fanny left to met a some girlfriends for a group date with their gentleman callers, and Jesse was all alone. He decided to take some of his Aunt' homemade brownies and masterbate in his room. But on the way to his room, he suddenly saw Aunt Fanny's door open. He had never been in her room before, and curiousity got the better of him.

Her room was more girl than his, and he found that her closet was open and than some clothes were left out in the open. He suddenly got a humorous idea.

He found one of her sundress and heels and quickly put them on, using pillows from her bed to imitate her fattening. He then sat down in front of her vanity and did some makeup until her resembled his Aunt oh so subtly. He then held out a brownie to his reflection and then began talking to it.

"Fiddlesticks, sweetheart" he spoke in a female voice. "You're skin and bones. Eat something so you don't rot away" He then shoved the brownie into his mouth like is Aunt often did. This cycle of imitating his aunt and stuffing himself went on until he finished the platter. Suddenly, he felt a a pressure in his stomach, and leaned forward. He farted loudly, causing the back of the dress to flow with the wind of the fart.

"Oh Poop-knuckles" He snickered. "I guess that's why they call me 'Fanny'" He roared with laughter.

"JESSE!!" he heard a female voice behind him. He turned around and panicked as he saw his Aunt Fanny in the door way. And she looked...

142.content:
“Kill ‘em with kindness.”

That’s how she planned to show her young nephew not to mock her, not when she took him in, not when she fed him, not when she tried to get him laid, not when she went out of her way to make sure he could smell her farts! No, she’s kill him with kindness. She listened to his explanations, his excuses, and went out of her way to take them as flattery. She led him to believe that she thought he wanted to be like her, to be the new Fanny, but she knew he didn’t. But that wasn’t going to stop her from turning him into one! Fanny was not as dumb as Jesse wanted to believe, growing up as fat and flatulent as she did made her acutely aware of when people were making fun of her.

“Jessie!” Fanny called to her young charge, “It’s almost 11 am, are you ready for your “Fanny Training?” sweetheart?” “Fanny Training” was what she called the time between lunch to after dinner where Jesse would eat, fart, and learn Fanny’s mannerisms to help complete his transformation. Who knew how long it would take, but did it really matter if he hated every minute of it?

She heard his sigh from his room and smiled, “Yeah. Let’s, oh God, start.” It was day 5 of Jesse’s “Fanny Training” and it all started with stuffing him into as small a girdle as they could fine. “Why are we doing this again?”

“Well if you’re going to be like yours truly,” lord did he not, “then you need to eat more, and this will hopefully force all that beautiful potential fat go to all the right places!” She cinched as tight as possible before sending him on to the next part. “Now go put on your matching outfit!” Fanny had been forcing Jesse to dress like her for lunch, and today she decided that wacky and tacky was the order of the day. So Jesse was forced to put on matching copies of her cheetah print spandex Capris and matching gloves, black and white hound’s tooth print tunic dress with, of course, cheetah print belt. She had black and white wingtip inspired pointed heels on with a 5-inch heel, but Jesse only has a 23-inch heel. 5-inch was beyond his capabilities right now. Fanny was acutely aware of how tacky she looked, and had to actually stifle a laugh when she saw her nephew. The laugh instead came out as one of her farts.

PHHHHRRRRTTTTTT!

“That reminds me,” Fanny snapped her fingers, “Don’t forget your milkshake!” She handed Jesse his milkshake and he frowned. “What the matter? Don’t you want to be like me?”

“Yeah…I do,” Jesse sighed as he held his nose and drank the shake, a Tabasco sauce and vanilla milkshake. Fanny used half a bottle of Tabasco sauce and it wrecked havoc with Jesse’s stomach making him fart as much as Fanny.

FFFFRRRRRTTTTTTT!

Almost as much as Fanny.

“So you ready to do your make up like me? You ready to take your next step for the day into being me?” Fanny asked enthusiastically with an air of naïveté in her voice, like she really believed that Jesse wanted to be like her. Playing the lead in all those school plays was really paying off.

“Yeah, do you want me to try this time or are you going to do it again?” a defeated Jesse asked.

“You take care of the lips and blush, I’ll do your foundation and eye shadow until you have some more experience,” Fanny told him. She did his makeup and let him finish it off before fitting a wig that looked like her huge updo. She was going to let Jesse grow his hair a little bit before “teaching” him how to properly style it. Jesse stood up and showed his aunt for any last minute changes, but on inspection Fanny found him to be a cute little masculine version of herself. “You look adorable!”

“Yeah, …adorable…”

“Okay, so you know the rules by now; double portions at lunch, fried snacks at one, ice cream at two, a 12-pack of ring dings at three, three slices of cake at four, and as much as you can eat for dinner at five! Any substitutions need to be approved by me so that we can get you just like me as soon as possible.”

“Then I can change back to my clothes after dinner,” Jesse checked.

“If you wanted to do that, sure. I guess,” Fanny shrugged. She didn’t force training around the clock like some others might because it might build resentment and Jesse might catch on she was doing this for revenge and not some misguided attempt to make them the same because she misunderstood what he wanted. He might eventually catch on, but this would put this off by some time. Fanny was playing a long game here, stretching Jesse’s humiliation out for as long as possible, hopefully to the point his body was similar to his and he would be unable to undo that.

“Oh Jesse,” Fanny cooed, “I’m so glad you took those first, almost insulting if you didn’t explain it so well, steps into trying to be me! We’re gonna be the same!”

VVVVRRRRPPPPP!

Jesse farted and Fanny clapped in excitement. “Yeah, …we’re gonna be the same…”

Jesse fist pumped, “Awesome! I’m gonna go see what stretchy clothes you have so I can really grow into them! Hey you don’t have a wig I can borrow do you?”

“Yeah, in my closet. Help yourself,” Fanny told her nephew who waddled out of the room to get ready for his feast. “Well this is a turn of events,” Fanny harrumphed. If he’s enjoying this can I really say I’m punishing him? I’ve got to think about this.”

The answer to Fanny's dilemma came the moment they arrived at the buffet.

On their way there, Jesse had been bouncing on the edge of his carseat, farting up a storm and dressed in one of her old floral dressed with a matching pumps, white gloves, and strawberry blonde wig done in a hug beehive. As they pulled into the drive way of the All You can Eat Buffet, Jesse hopped out of the car, gave loud bellow of "Onside, Waiters! Mama's got an appetite!" and made a mad dash inside fast as he could in his pumps. Fanny followed behind him begrudgingly, starting to think that she had lost this war.

That's when Jesse broke the silence with a loud FRRRAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!, causing many of the eaters to roar with laughter before returning to their meals. Jesse blushed furiously and turned around in shame.

He's only likes acting like a me when its in the privacy of my own home! Fanny thought devilishly. He's only now realizing how ridiculous he looks as a boy dressed up and acting like the aunt he made fun of. He's afraid to be this way in public!

Fanny figured that Jesse would think because the buffet is new, there wouldn't be too many people here to see him like this. Or they would have low lighting. Or whatever. But it was obvious he was embarrass to be like he was around other people other than her.

If he's embarrassed to be a big beautiful woman with gas around other people, then I'll have to take his punishment to a more public audience. Aunt Fanny smiled wickedly. I'll need help. And as it just so happens, all my friends and their daughters, nieces, or "others" are here as well.

As they ate, Fanny and her friends talked about the future, while their daughters & niece stuffed Jesse with all the fatting food they could.

"He's going to make a beautiful girl like us!" Sara rejoiced, shoving spoonfuls of cheesy mashed potatoes into Jesse's unwilling maw.

"We should introduce him to our friends! They love guys like Jesse!" Nicole stated, taking her turn by forcing Fannys special shake down Jesse's throat.

Harriet wasn't just feeding Jesse. She was rubbing his swollen belly and occasionally drifted to his thighs (and a little to close to what lay between" as he ate. Jesse could swear she was looking at him with lust while subtly putting.

Much Later, Fanny and Jesse returned home. Jesse collapsed on the couch and passed out while blowing out many folks. Hours later, he awoke to the sound of a doorbell and saw Aunt Fanny opening the door to reveal.
14223.title: It takes a Village to Punish a Nephew.

choices: Joan takes him shopping
Hilary take him eating
They get sidetracked trying to look Jeese up with a hottie
On the way Jesse's ass causes a thunderous commotion
Someone interrupts them with another idea
142231.content:
“Joan! Hilary! What brings you Jesse and my way?” Fanny greeted her with what Jesse didn’t realize was a rhetorical question. Fanny damn well knew what her friends were here to do. They were here to help her punish Jesse further.

Joan laughed, “Why Fanny you funny farter you!”

Fanny’s fart reverberated throughout the house stinking up the foyer where they stood, “Guilty as charged!” she mockingly curtsied.

“Oh, stinky my dear,” Hilary waved the noxious smell from her nose. “But as much as we would love to sit around and smell your farts dear, we’re here to help out your lovely niece Jesse!”

“Here for me?” Jesse mumbled as he sat up on the couch from his nap. If these two fat women wanted him, Jesse knew it wasn’t to indulge what he wanted. He straightened his beehive wig and tried to sneak away, but was immediately caught.

“Jesse!” Fanny yelled. “Where you going honey? Get over here and say hello! You have guests!” Jesse hung his head in defeat and walked over to his aunt.

“Hi, Joan. Hi, Hilary,” Jesse smiled weakly at them in greeting.

“Oh honey, don’t be shy,” Fanny slapped him on the ass as had as she could. He’d have her handprint tattooed to his as for four full days. But the result was exactly what Fanny had intended; Jesse’s rump trumpeted out a fart that rivaled his aunt’s from earlier.

THHHRRRRRPPPTTTTTT!

“Jesse dear, you are too much,” Hilary laughed. She took Jesse by the hand, “Now c’mon. We are going to put some REAL meat on those bones!”

“And help you develop a sense of style just like mine!” Joan held her hand out for Jesse to look at all the gaudy bangles she wore so proudly.

“So dinner and shopping? Out there? In public?” Jesse gulped.

“I know what you’re thinking,” Hilary spoke gently as she put her hand on his shoulder reassuringly, “but between your looks and your farts everyone will be staring at you.”

“Yeah, just what I want,” Jesse said fearfully. His ass sounded off again giving the impression he was in for this.

“So let’s get going then,” Joan smiled, “off to the wig outlet!”

“Wig outlet?” Jesse asked confused.

“Dear,” Hilary giggled, “Did you think that beehive wig was fooling anyone?” Jesse opened his mouth to say something but quickly closed it in further embarrassment. She put her arm around him an lead him out of the house, “Let’s go get you one that doesn’t make you, dear, look like a teenage boy in a girl’s wig.”

They drove to the outlet but wouldn’t let Jesse leave the car unless he filled it up with the same stink that his aunt Fanny would have. After a few minutes of pushing out farts, some which almost made him shit his dress, the car smelt like a dumpster at high noon on a hot June day. The two bigger ladies sniffed the air greedily and finally relented that the smell was subsiding so they could finally leave the car for the outlet.

Jesse’s fart stuck to their clothes but where as he was embarrassed to literally smell like ass, Joan and Hilary took turns sniffing each other and enjoying it. They were enjoying it so much they failed to hear the sales associate when he asked them what they wanted. “What’s that dear?” Hilary asked.

“I said, how can I help you,” he looked at Jesse, “ladies?” Jesse stepped to the side so that Hilary partially blocked the clerk’s view of him.

“Yes,” Joan smiled. Jesse had to admit her smile did light up the room. He could kind of see himself with her for a night of fun, especially considering her rather large…chest. His mind began to wander in imagination so he relaxed just long enough for his trouser trombone to blast a loud but low note, which drew the clerk’s attention to him. “As you can see our friend here has a less than convincing wig. We need your loudest, biggest, fire engine red beehive wig!”

“Wait!’ Jesse interjected, “But I’m a blond!”

“We know dear,” Hilary smiled, “but a truly trashy woman has tacky red hair like your aunt Fanny.”

“You’re related to Fanny,” the clerk lit up. “Man I just love your aunt! I really love her big, giant…” he cupped his hands in front of his chest, “…farts! I really love her farts!” He composed himself and took a breath. “So the tallest, reddest beehive wig I have, then?”

“Unless you wanted an afro like mine dear?” Hilary teased. Jesse just shook his head no. “Bring us a few choices, money isn’t an object here.” The clerk shook his head yes in understanding and went off to collect what he needed. Soon he presented the three of them with three red beehive wigs for them to try on and sample. “Oh, very nice selection dear,” she complimented the clerk as placed a mirror on the counter for them to use and backed away to give them time and privacy.

Joan and Hilary laughed their big buts off as they made Jesse try on the wigs and in return tried the wigs on themselves. They were each wearing a big red beehive wig when Jesse slipped on the last one and their eyes lit up. “That’s the one!” Joan smiled.

“It certainly is!” Hilary agreed.

“This one?” Jesse asked unconvinced as he stared in the mirror. it mush have been almost fifteen inches tall and was as red Dracula’s favorite drink. “It seems like a joke more than a wig. It’s so big and garish!”

“And that screams Fanny!” Joan smirked. “And that’s who you want to be like, isn’t it?”

Jesse clenched his jaw in frustration, but finally relented, “…Yes…”

“Then it’s your dear! On us!” Hilary smacked him on the back, the suddenness of it all making Jesse fart uncontrollably.

FFFRRRRRAAAAAAPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTT!

152.content:
You look to see the source of the call was your restaurateur of an Aunt, Loretta.

She was a mountain of a woman. Easily at least 400 pounds. Her face was completely round and with a smile that was big as her hips. Her double chin, that was coming close to a third, lead down to a thick neck and beefy shoulders. Her arms were fairly plump with gold bracelets dangling from both sides. Her breasts were the size of watermelons and rested on top of a gigantic belly. She was dressed in an ill-fitted, crimson sundress, stretched rather tightly across her exceedingly ample bosom and round belly with simple white flats. Her shaggy black hair was tied in a big bun and her posterior was so big it was at shelf status.
As she waddle towards you heading into a tight, affectionate embrace. You can feel yourself sinking into her plush belly as she pulled you in. It was til your body was completely pressing her belly, that you heard a....

'phhrrrt'

"What was that?" You say, as Loretta let you go.

"Mercy me. Excuse me." She said waving herself with a plush hand. "Just thought I mention it Jessie, that I have quite the gas issue."

"I see" You say trying not to point out the obvious.

"I guess when you try a number of cuisines from your own restaurant, you tend to get that kind of result" She said giggling. You roll your eyes as she escorted you to her ride; a simple family sedan.

During the ride to her place, she tells you a little bit about herself. She the owner of a notorious Italian restaurant explaining to you her passion for cooking and eating, even mentioning the dishes that lets her let out powerful toots. She elbows you after she mentions that. You chuckle trying to humor her.

"This is quite a treat, we should celebrate with a meal. I sure hope you have an appetite like mine. It could be our first step to bonding like Aunt and nephew." She explains hopefully. You felt your stomach grumbling from that last sentence, liking the idea of food.

You take a moment to think about it. Maybe it won't be so bad. She really is trying and she's quite friendly. Could be worst.

PPPPPPHHHHHHRRRRRRRTTTTTT!!!

Much worse....

1522.content:
You didn't arrive at your Aunt's house til it was fairly late in the evening. You were tired and the gassy trip courtesy of your Aunt was far from pleasant. Opening the car door, you carried your things inside while Loretta carried the rest. Despite her wealth and success of her restaurant, Loretta lived quite modest. It was a nice, quaint suburban establishment with a simple brick structure.

" I like to live humble Jesse" Explained Loretta as she waddled inside with her caboose moving from side to side with little toots along the way.

You parked yourself on the couch while Loretta headed towards the kitchen.

"We'll worry about your things later. The prioty is to fill your belly." She said calling out. You said nothing. Looking around, you see that your Aunt has some good taste. A widescreen tv, a large plush couch that could fit 3 Lorettas and the place is quite tidy which put you at ease.

Half an hour later, Loretta calls you into the dinning room where you were astounded by the spread. Nearly every single Italian dish you can think of is right in front you. The aroma was captivating causing drool from your mouth to drop. Loretta catches on and smiles.

"Well, no need to stand here while our tummys rumbling. Shall we dig in?" She winked as she parked her huge butt on the chair at the end of the table. You take the other chair that was a meter away from your Aunt.You aunt was drinking a small glass of wine, while you seem to have a big glass of milk.

As Loretta was sipping her wine, you took a fork full of pasta and let i slide into your mouth. It was then a sudden rush of adrenaline hit you as you started to scooping the fork after of fork of pasta. You never tasted anything so good in your life!

"Wow! This is great!" You say with a muffled mouth. Loretta smile.

"I'm so glad you enjoy my cooking Jesse. I adore cooking so much, that I spent my life trying to perfect it. And now, I have my own restaurant, a collection of cookbooks and one happy nephew." Beamed Loretta.

You continued to shove more food in your mouth, moving on to the pizza and even the ravioli.

When the last of the food was eaten, you and Loretta were rubbing your bellies in satisfaction. While you had quite the pot belly, it was nothing compare to Loretta's beach whale of a belly. A massive fart left Loretta which instigated a bellow of laugh from her but you were too stuffed to care.

"Make sure you have some milk dear help to wash it down" Insisted Loretta. You grab the glass and sipped it down in one gulp. The moment it hit your stomach, this happened.

PPPPHHHHHRRRRRTTTTT!

You were red in the face, Loretta on the other hand.....

PPPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!

"It's my way of saying: thanks for the grub" Laughed Loretta. You chuckled at the notion how laid back she is on table manners. You even notice your skin was going a faint olive color matching your Aunt's while your features were getting a bit softer. Loretta smiled.

"He has potential....." She said mentally.

15223.content:
Out from her Kitchen, Loretta brought a few large plates, each topped with a different dessert. There was a huge, cream-dripping Panna Cotta, a fat chocolate cake smeared with layers of black frosting and chocolate chunks, a huge bowl of her own home-made icecream and an equally fat cheesecake to follow.
"I decided to go wild" she giggled, setting it all down and sitting her huge behind down upon the chair, making it give a loud creak as it took her huge booty. "There's plenty to go around, and all leftovers will just go in the fridge for later"

You nod, dumbstruck. You feel so full after the main course, your belly stuffed from the courses of pasta, but suddenly you know that you can take some more. That you need some more of this beautiful setup.

Both you and your aunt tuck in and for a while, the air is filled with the scooping of spoons, squelching of cream and smacking on lips. You simply eat and eat, shoving in mouthfuls of chocolate cake, followed by several scoops of vanilla icecream before topping it off with the creamiest cheesecake you have ever eaten. Food spills down your chin, and Loretta stops devouring her own gargantuan meal to dab at you affectionately with a napkin.

"Thanks" you blush, swallowing down some more.
"No worries sweetie-pie!" she coos, her own portions at least three times as big as yours. You reply with a loud, rasping belch. "Uuuurrrrrrrrrrrrppp!" which only makes you blush more and her laugh.

Finally, you stop eating. Loretta finishes to, having cleaned her plates despite seconds of her rich, tasty treats. The woman seems to have an endless stomach. You feel like bursting, your belly taunt and protruding outwards. You look pregnant in your girth and its not lost on your aunt.
"My" she giggles "When are you due?"

1551.content:
Jesse stared at this large, Circus Clown of a woman that was his Aunt Kelly.

Her weight wasn't even like his parents had described to him in their stories. She was Huge! She was only 5 inches taller than you, but she had to be at least 400 pounds! Her belly was perfectly round and had two watermelon-sized breast resting comfortable on top of it. Her arms were like bags of pudding and her thighs like tree trunk. Her butt stood out behind her and had a tremendous shelf with it. Her face was plumped with dimpled cheeks and a second chin going-on third.

But it was her outfit that really stood out. Her skin was chalk white, and she was wearing a cotton candy blue and white polkadot strapless tutu with many frills and petticoats around her wide hips, making them appear even bigger due to the frilly, puffiness of the petticoats. Long, thigh-high lavender-stripped socks wrapped around her thick, meaty legs and flowed down into large, red, clown-hopper mary-janes. She also had cartoonish Mickey Mouse Gloves, yet each hand had five fingers. Her plump face was slathered in clown makeup: comically huge, shiny ruby red lips, dots of pink blush on her checks, baby blue eye liner, and a huge red clown nose the size of a tennis ball. Her hair, another prominent feature, swirled into an soft-serve ice cream swirl-like beehive and alternated with cotton candy pink and blue colors.

Jesse could only stare at this cartoonish caricature of a Circus Clown, his Aunt Whoopie.

"Hyuck Hyuck!" She laughed, comically bouncing over to Jesse and wrapping him a smothering bearhug. "Its so incredible to finally meet you! How was the bus trip? Did the wheels go 'round and 'round all the live-long day?"

Jesse politely broke apart from Aunt Whoopie to try and get a handle on the fact that she was a clown. He knew her name sounded weird when ever his mom talked about his Aunt, but he had always assumed she was named after Whoopie Goldberg or something. He never expected his Aunt's name to reference that she was a clown. Aunt Whoopie saw the expression on his face and gave him a big, dopey grin.

"That's right Jesse! Aunt Whoopie is a big old circus clown! I'm one of the lead acts at the town's personal circus. Been one ever since I was 16! I hope you aren't afraid of clowns."

"O-oooh now, Aunt Whoopie," Jesse stammered, worried his shock might have offended his Aunt. "I don't fear clowns. Actually, I'm indifferent to them. I just didn't expect you to be one, not that it matters."

"Well good!" She said, and then squeezed her boobs repeatedly, causing strange loud bicycle honks to emit from then. How did she do that? , Jesse wondered.

"Well, my clown car is out in the parking lot, so let's-" suddenly her gazed was pulled away when she saw a Mother trying to cheer up her crying toddler daughter. "'Excuse me a sec, Jesse. Duty Calls"

Jesse curiously watched his Aunt Whoopie comically waddle over to the mother and child. Greeting the child with a wave and hello, out of nowhere Aunt Whoopie pretended to slip and slide like she was on ice, before falling backwards onto her cartooonishly large backside, with a loud, whoopee cushion-sounding fart exploding out of it, making her petticoats bluster from the stinky wind. PPPPPPPPHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTT< br /> Instantly, the mother and child both fell to the floor in laughter, and Aunt Whoopie began somersaulting her way back to her nephew.

"Well, now you know why my clown name is 'Whoopie'", she said, beaming a little to proudly. She got up, grabbed one of Jesse's bags, and began leading him to the parking lot. "C'mon. We got to get you home so we can make it back in time for your welcoming show."

"Welcoming show?" Jesse asked.

"Hyuck, Yeppers! Me and the rest of the circus wanted to properly welcome you to my hometown with a complimentary performance, where you will get a private boxiest among the crowd to watch us preform."

"Oh, that's really nice of you, Aunt Whoopie," Jesse said, touched by your Aunt's present. Jesse wasn't expecting his Aunt to put on a show just for him. It was really nice of her. Maybe she, this town, and this whole moving-in thing won't be so bad.

The duo got out to the parking lot, and true to Aunt Whoopie's word her car was a tiny clown car with a rainbow of colors and a cartoonish face painted on the front. Despite Aunt Whoopie's huge size, she and Jesse were able to fit along with his luggage, but it was a tight fit nonetheless. They drove back to her house, which turned out to be a large, two-story castle-like house decorated in all sorts of colors and patterns. The inside was adorned with much circus memorabilia, including artwork and photo graphs of famous circuses, crazy furniture, and much more. It was like a live-in funhouse.

After they dropped Jesse's stuff off, Aunt Whoopie took him down town to the circus, which actually was more like a giant amazement park inside the world's largest circus tent. Aunt Whoopie gave him a tour of all the rides and attractions, then took him backstage in the Center-Square Theater and showed him his private box.

Then the show began. Jesse soon found that the entire act was just like a Classic Circus, but every one of the performers was dressed like a clown. The strongmen, the acrobats, the daredevils, even some of the animals had funny costumes on. Jesse noticed that there were male clowns of all shapes and sizes, but almost all the female clowns, young and old, were overweight and cartoonish like his Aunt Whoopie. And many of them enjoyed making farting noises like her.

Overall, Jesse enjoyed the show. He hadn't been to a circus since he was a boy, and this brought back memories of his mom and dad. The show had all the classic acts of a three-ringed circus, but classic clown acts were shown to be extra ridiculous and slap-stick cartoony. These clowns really do love making fools of themselves. Jesse thought. I wonder if they ever feel humiliated.

Eventually, it came time for Aunt Whoopie's act, which was over the top. She did all the classic clown tricks: magic, juggling, jokes. But her finally was when she and her fellow female Clowns brought out a barrage of sturdy chairs, arranged them in a orchestra-like fashion, and proceed to slam their butts down and fart the classic Offenbach Can-Can song. Despite the strangeness of it, the entire audience had given them a standing ovation and 3 encores.

After the show, Aunt Whoopie invited Jesse backstage to meet her friends and coworkers. The entire performing act was friendly and welcoming, especially Aunt Whoopie's female friends and their daughters/nieces, who took a real shine to Jesse and began comically flirting with him. Some of them even tried to get him to squeeze their boobs and asscheeks so they could make their honking and whoopee cushion noises. Jesse refused, of course, but he had to admit these girls were really outgoing and funloving. He did notice something strange about some of them, like how a few of them talked in slightly deeper voiced than female clowns should. Whatever the case, eventually Aunt Whoopie and Jesse decided to call it a night and return home.

For the next few weeks, Jesse discovered that it was pretty fun to have a clown for an aunt. ...But there were drawbacks as well.

Jesse soon discovered that his Aunt Whoopie was a clown 24/7. She was always goofing around, which had been ok at first. But Jesse had soon become the main focus of his Aunt Jesse's jokes and pranks. More than once a day she would try out new bad jokes on him or pulls some sort of prank on him, like messing with his shower's water temperature by flushing the toilet or planting whoopee cushions on every seay he sat on. Whats more, because of his grumpiness toward this foolishness, Aunt Whoopie would use him as a source of comedic joke at her act and pretend to be him ruling about. She swore it was all in good fun.

Jesse soon discovered why his Aunt was also called "Whoopie". She had an outrageous sex life. Almost every night she would bring home an random audience member or male clown, and proceed to have loud, farting and cartoonish sexy with the. She would even try offering to set up Jesse with one of her clown friends or their nieces/daughters, but Jesse refused on the - secret - grounds that the girls could be like Aunt Whoopie in the bedroom.

Overall, it was tiring living with Aunt Whoopie, who tried to get Jesse into the clowning business. She finally left him alone one night to do a private show at a kid's birthday party. Jesse spent most of his time avoiding and failing her pranks she left him. He eventually got to her room where he saw spare leftovers of her old costumes and makeup, and a wicked thought came to his head.

He dressed himself in a spare tutu, clogs, leggings and rainbow afro wig, applied some makeup to his face, and proceed to prance around Aunt Whoopie's room pretending to be her. He would maker fake laughing sounds, tell bad jokes to no one, and even make raspberry noises to immitate her farting.

FRRRT FRRRT Hyuck Hycuk! Hiya Folks, I'm Whoopie the Clown" he said, patting his pillow stuff, backside and belly and making fart noises. FRRRT FRRRT

He roared with laughter until-

"JESSE!!"

Startled, he turned around to find his Aunt Whoopie standing in the middle of the doorway.

And it appeared that she was...

15512.content:
“Do you think just because I’m a clown I’m some object of ridicule for you to make fun of? To mock? To jeer?” Whoopsie yelled at her nephew.

“A little,” Jesse shrugged.

“Well I guess that’s all there is to it then,” she grinned mischievously, even for a clown. She grabbed Jesse by the sides of his face and planted a big, wet kiss on his face, and as she did so she released a fart louder then a circus marching band and longer than a line at a circus bathroom. And as her fart blasted into the ether, Jesse was sure he felt a pressure building inside of him, a big uncomfortable pressure. Whoopsie broke the kiss and winked at her nephew, “See you in the morning.” She pushed him out of her room laughing menacingly as she did, “Hyuk, hyuk, hyuk, hyuk, hyuk!” Jesse let out a little fart of his own and headed to his bedroom to strip out of his aunt’s clothes, wondering what had just happened.

In the morning Whoopsie was scrambling her eggs when she heard the scream. Jesse rushed downstairs to find him aunt at the stove dressed in a vinyl clown suit that was striped like a beach ball, with her lavender striped thigh high socks, her inflated gloved, and her trade mark oversized, red, bubble-toed mary janes shoes. But the biggest thing she wore was the shit-eating grin underneath her golf ball sized red nose. “What’s up hon?” she guffawed.

“Why is my skin so pale? Why is it so, so, so…!” Jesse stammered.

“White?” Whoopsie’s eyes lit up, “Almost CLOWN white?”

“Yes!”

“Let me ask you some questions,” Whoopsie smiled as she began to eat her eggs. “When was the last time you saw me put on make up? Or change wigs? Or without my shoes on? And did you think this amazing flatulence was normal for a woman my age? Or any woman for that matter?”

“What are you talking about? You caught me wearing your make up and one of your wigs last night!”

“My OLD make up and my OLD wig!” Whoopsie’s clown smile seemed to grow larger. “Did you see any newer make up or wigs that weren’t packed away?”

“No.”

“And why do you think that is?” Whoopsie said with a hint of menace.

“No,” Jesse shook his head in disbelief.

“Yes!” Whoopsie shook her head in an exaggerated manner.

“No!”

“Yes!”

“NO!”

Whooopsie slipped off one clown shoe revealing a huge foot inside. Jesse’s eyes grew as big as saucer dishes and he almost burst into tears when she licked the thumb of her glove and rubbed her make up with it, revealing that her make up wasn’t smudged or rubbed off in the slightest. “YES!”

“So I’m turning into a clown?” Jesse said slumping to the floor. “But how?”

“Magic,” she told him nonchalantly, “Every female clown in this town has been affected by the magic, making them all grow fatter with clown features. Oh and really raunchy flatulence.” She leaned to the side and ripped a juicy fart.

FFFRRRRPPPPTTTT!

“Can’t forget that clown flatulence. Don’t worry you’ll love to be all farty! We all do!”

“I can’t believe you did this to me!” Jesse yelled at her.

“And I can’t believe you would steal into my bedroom and dress as me in order to make fun of me!” Whoopsie yelled back. “I took you in! I’m all you have! You needed me! And I did what any loving Aunt would!”

“Turn my into a female clown?” Jesse said ruefully.

“Well now you really need me,” Whoopsie flicked some eggs in his face. “Now get up and learn how to be a flatulent clown like a man would!” Whoopsie told him contemptuously, all the fun and humor she normally had was gone for the moment. Whoopsie stood up and composed herself. She took a deep breath and her normal happy face returned. She beckoned for Jesse to follow her and walked towards her room leaving a cloud of farts for him to follow.

FRT! FRT! FRT! FRT! FRT!
15512.title: There's No Fury Like A Flatulent Clown's Fury

choices: Jesse tries on the clothes and starts to fill them out

Jesse want to meet the legendary Fartsie the Clown
155123.content:
Whoopsie threw open her closet and started to look around her closet for a good outfit for Jesse to wear when he eventually turned into a clown. Things she considered received one nose honk, things she liked received two, and things she loved got as many as she felt were needed. A very pale Jesse sat on her bed and wondered if he was going to be able to do that with his nose. If he was truthful with himself he would’ve admitted that he was really fearful that his nose would be able to do that. He needed to drive those thoughts from his mind and quickly changed the subject, “How did you become a clown?”

“I kissed a girl,” Whoopsie commented as she put tights and dress together and vetoed it because they didn’t clash.

“Seriously. I know you’re mad at me for everything I did, but you’ve turned me into a clown AND switched my gender! Can’t I at least know how all this started?”

Whoopsie laughed and shook her head, “No, I kissed a girl the way I kissed you and I was changed the way I changed you.” She turned around and crossed her arms in thought, “I guess it was more like a girl kissed me.” She sighed in remembered satisfaction and blew out a huge fart.

FFFFFFFFRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTT!

“So why did this clown lady kiss you? And did my mother know? And if she did why did you hide it from her?”

Whoopsie laughed again, “Yes your mother did know and she accepted me but we felt it best not to tell you.”

“Why?”

“You seemed like the type of person who wouldn’t take knowing that clowns are real very well,” Whoopsie nodded at Jesse.

Jesse’s jaw dropped, “So what was your long term game plan when I came to live with you? Hope it never came up?”

“Jesse, honey, I’m a clown. You’re really give me some props in long term planning when you probably shouldn’t.”

Jesse sank his face into his hands, “I can’t believe you say things like that about yourself, but were offended by my impression.”

Whoopsie looked at him crossly and farted her displeasure.

TTTHHHHHHRRRRPPPPPPTTTT!

“ANYWAY,” Whoopsie said snidely, “I was changed when I came to this town to be a clown on a professional level.”

“Professional level? You were what? An amateur clown since you were a teen?”

“Yeah,” Whoopsie replied. She watched as Jesse’s nose began to adopt a rosie pink color but made no mention of it. “I worked as a party clown since I was a teen, like 14-years-old, and I heard that so many professional clowns had come from this town, and since I’m a career oriented clown I came here to advance my career and hopefully get into a circus.”

“That makes a kind of sense,” Jesse admitted.

“So here I am, new in town,” Whoopsie laid out a yellow jumper with red polka dots, whose left arm and right leg were a solid red, and whose right arm and left leg were red and white striped, and had large red pom-poms down the middle of the torso. “And I’m walking around like my feet filmy shoes, you know?” Whoopsie told her nephew.

“No, what the Hell does that mean?” Jesse asked, wondering why his aunt would think he understands clown slang.

“It means I was full of myself!” Whoopsie snapped back. She stopped, smoothed out her blue and pink swirled hair, and let a new calm take her over. “So I was acting like my nose was the size of a watermelon,” she paused to see if Jesse had a comment. He did not and she slowly honked her nose before beginning again, “And after a few months of that-!”

“What do you want from me?” Whooopsie shrugged, “I’m a clown! I’m impulsive,” she smirked at her nephew as his nose changed from rosy pink to rosy red in color. “So I had been annoying Fartsie the clown for a while, acting like I could out clown fart the fating clown herself.”

“I kind of dressed like her and mimicked Fartsie,” Whoopsie smiled nervously. “I made fun of her voice and her flatulence.” She let a little high pitched out that reflected her embarasment.

Vrrrrrrrrrpppppppppt!

“I think I hate you,” Jesse’s eyes narrowed.

“All right, calm down” Whoopsie waved her nephew off. She paired a pair of green and blew striped socks with the jumper, and started looking for clown shoes to clash with the outfit. “So once I was done acting a fool, oh there’s those shoes, Fartsie decided to give me the kiss (you know what kiss I’m talking about) and here we are: Whoopsie the farting clown!” She put her hands on her big hips and smiled as if she was very pleased with herself.

“God you’re the worst,” Jesse rolled his eyes at his aunt.

“Oh hush, being a clown is the greatest, sexiest, and smelliest job you’ll ever have,” Whoopsie ignored him. “Now go see how these clothes fit,” she smirked ass he threw him the clothes she had picked out.

You are Jessie, 21 year old (unknowingly bisexual) college graduate who unfortunately has lost both his parents to a plane crash. Still trying to figure out what to do with your life, your Aunt - whom you have never met before but have heard many stories about - feels you should be with family and offers you a place in her home. Not wanting to hurt her feelings and and with no other options you accept.

When you arrive at her place, you are surprised to find out your Aunt is a slightly gassy, very feminine BBW characicature of a traditional female stereotype (High Society Lady, Southern Belle, Bimbo, Cheerleader, etc.) and that she loves being who she is. After a few weeks of living with her craziness, you are left alone and find some of her clothes/costumes. As a joke, you try them on and parade about her in a mocking fashion; enjoying yourself... Until you turn around and find she was watching you.

Now, depending on her response of Ignorant-Bliss or Insulted-Anger, she has begun to turn you into her exact image (a younger version at least) either so you can fulfill your "fantasy" of being just like her, or punishment for mocking her and making you the real caricature!
